Customer.name: Customer
Customer.description: Represents the customer role of an individual with respect to a particular company or organization.

CustomerStatusType.description: The status of the customer account.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns the record.

PartyId.description: Required. Represents the individual object related to this customer record.

TotalLifeTimeValue.description: The total revenue amount gained from this customer.
